index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, authorizing an agreement with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development for financial assistance in the form of a Supportive Housing Grant to expand the continuum of care for homeless persons; authorizing related agreements; creating certain positions and increasing the expenditure allowances in the 1995 Adopted Budget and 1996 Endorsed Budget of the Department of Housing and Human Services, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Health, Human Services, Education and Libraries
